T02D2485:181a-1: badzra y'a na m'u la patti pritti /
T02D2485:181a-3: rdo rje theg pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi pa'i 'grel pa /
T02D2485:181a-4: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2485:181a-5: nyan thos kyi lus ngag gtso bor gyur pa'i spang bya bdun gyi mtshan nyid dang /
T02D2485:181a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje gtso bor gyur pa'i spang bya bcu'i mtshan nyid dang /
T02D2485:181a-7: gsang sngags rnal 'byor chen po'i thabs dang shes rab
T02D2485:181a-8: zung du 'jug pa gtso bor gyur pa'i spang bya
T02D2485:181a-10: de la gnyis ni gzhung gzhan rnams las gsal bas 'dir ma bshad do //
T02D2485:181b-0: gsang sngags rnal 'byor chen po'i rnam par thar pa la ltos te bstan @181b pa la /
T02D2485:181b-1: spyir thob par bya ba dang /
T02D2485:181b-2: mngon par rtogs pa'i bye brag dang /
T02D2485:181b-4: de la gnyis ni rtsa ba'i rgyud dang /
T02D2485:181b-5: bshad pa'i rgyud dag las gsal bas 'dir logs shig tu ma brjod do //
T02D2485:181b-6: bsrung ba'i tshul la gnyis te /
T02D2485:181b-9: de nyid ni dam bca' ba'i yul dang /
T02D2485:181b-10: spong ba'i bye brag gis te /
T02D2485:181b-12: sngom pa sangs rgyas thams cad de //
T02D2485:181b-13: ae wam la ni rab tu bzhugs //
T02D2485:181b-14: rgyu yis yul las mi 'da' bas //
T02D2485:181b-15: dam tshig zhes ni bshad pa yin //
T02D2485:181b-17: de bas na dbang bzhi'i bye brag gis dam tshig kyang bzhi ste /
T02D2485:181b-19: sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin pa dang /
T02D2485:181b-21: mthar thug pa'i bye brag gis so //
T02D2485:181b-22: de dag kyang mdor bsdu na /
T02D2485:181b-30: dbang gsum gyi dbye bas so //
T02D2485:181b-32: lus la sogs pa'i bye brag gis so //
T02D2485:181b-33: de la sngom pa'i tshul khrims la sogs pa'i sngom
T02D2485:181b-34: pa gsum la gnas na sangs rgyas nyid dam rdo
T02D2485:181b-35: rje 'chang chen po 'thob po zhes 'byung la /
T02D2485:181b-36: de yang rdo rje rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa'i skabs nas ji skad du /
T02D2485:181b-37: byang chub sems 'dzin gyur nas ni //
T02D2485:181b-38: lha gzhan la ni mi mos pas //
T02D2485:181b-39: dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang //
T02D2485:181b-40: de la gzhol zhing 'bab pa yis //
T02D2485:181b-41: gsod dang rku dang 'khrig pa dang //
T02D2485:181b-42: brdzun dang chang ni rnam par spang //
T02D2485:181b-43: khyim pa'i tshul du gnas pas kyang //
T02D2485:181b-44: rig sngags rgyal po rtag tu bsgrub //
T02D2485:181b-45: gal te der ni rab byung na //
T02D2485:181b-46: sdom pa gsum la gnas par 'gyur //
T02D2485:181b-47: so sor thar dang byang chub sems //
T02D2485:181b-49: zhes gsungs pas de'i don la 'jug par bya ste /
T02D2485:181b-50: 'dir de dag dang mi 'gal ba ni ye shes kyi bye brag gis te /
T02D2485:181b-51: rang bzhin pa'i chos bzhi mi spyad cing bcas pa
T02D2485:181b-52: la de bzhin nyid kyi bdag nyid can gyis shes
T02D2485:181b-53: pas spyod cing don chen po yod pa'i phyir dang
T02D2485:182a-0: / shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa la ni dngos po la @182a * //
T02D2485:182a-1: 'gal ba med pas nyes byas la sogs par mi gzhag go //
T02D2485:182a-2: de ltar rtsa ba'i dam tshig bstan pa la spyir btang ba ni gang la gnod pa dang /
T02D2485:182a-3: gang gis bar du gcod pa dang /
T02D2485:182a-4: gang dri ma can du byas pa ste dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum dang /
T02D2485:182a-6: rang gi rgyud dang go rims bzhin no //
T02D2485:182a-8: gnyi ga'i bar du gcod cing ngan song gsum du ltung bar byed do //
T02D2485:182a-9: 'dra bas ni gnyi ga'i bar du gcod cing ngan
T02D2485:182a-10: song gsum du ltung yang sdug bsngal drag po la
T02D2485:182a-11: sogs pa ma yin pa dang /
T02D2485:182a-12: 'bring gis ni gnyis ka'i bar du gcod kyang ngan
T02D2485:182a-13: song du ltung ba'i rgyu ste khyad par du mi
T02D2485:182a-14: byed pa dang / chung dus ni 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub kyi bar du gcod do //
T02D2485:182a-15: yang spyir 'gro ba ni nyon mongs pa drug dang /
T02D2485:182a-16: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang 'brel pa'o //
T02D2485:182a-35: tha mal pa la bshags pa'o //
T02D2485:182a-36: da ni gzhung la 'jug par bya ste /
T02D2485:182a-37: slob dpon la ni brnyas pa dang //
T02D2485:182a-38: zhes smos pa la gang las dbang bskur mchog thob pa med pa dang /
T02D2485:182a-39: slob dpon gyis de nyid bstan pa dang /
T02D2485:182a-41: nyon mongs pa dang 'brel pa'i sems dang /
T02D2485:182a-42: lus ngag yid kyis sbyor ba byas pa dang /
T02D2485:182a-43: go ba'am khyad par can gyis nyon mongs ba bskyed pa dang /
T02D2485:182a-44: rang bzhin du gnas pa dang /
T02D2485:182a-47: yan lag brgyad kyi ni dngos gzhi yin la /
T02D2485:182a-48: sbyor ba ni ji srid ma rdzogs pa de srid do //
T02D2485:182a-49: gzhan ma tshang ba la yan lag gtso bo yod pa ni nyes pa chen po'o //
T02D2485:182a-50: 'bring dang chung du yod pa la ni nyes pa 'bring dang chung du'o //
T02D2485:182a-51: gsum po lta bu'i gnas skabs su ni nyes pa med do //
T02D2485:182a-52: gnyis dang shan 'dra ba ni phyogs dang mthun pa'o //
T02D2485:182b-0: slob dpon thams @182b cad la rdo rje sems dpar blta'o zhes pa ni bslab par bya'o //
T02D2485:182b-1: rtsa ba ni dbang gis ldang ngo //
T02D2485:182b-2: tshogs dang bsnyen sgrub ma gtogs pa bzhis ni 'dra ba las ldang ngo //
T02D2485:182b-3: gong ma gnyis kyis ni 'bring las ldang ngo //
T02D2485:182b-4: tha ma gnyis kyis ni chung du las ldang ngo //
T02D2485:182b-5: de bzhin du gzhan rnams la yang ci rigs par shes par bya'o //
T02D2485:182b-6: bde gshegs bka' las 'das pa dang //
T02D2485:182b-8: 'dir ni bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' dang rdo rje
T02D2485:182b-9: 'chang gi bka' thams cad kyang gdul bya'i ched du
T02D2485:182b-10: yin la / de yang 'gro ba'i don du ste /
T02D2485:182b-11: de bas na gang zag bdag grol ba'i dbang du byas pas thams cad kyang der 'dus so //
T02D2485:182b-12: rdo rje 'chang gi bka' yang bzhi ste /
T02D2485:182b-13: las kyi bye brag thams cad bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' dang /
T02D2485:182b-17: de las 'das pa ni gnyis te /
T02D2485:182b-20: de dag kyang dgag sgrub kyi bye brag gis rnam pa bzhi'o //
T02D2485:182b-21: de la yan lag ni thun mong ba gsum dang /
T02D2485:182b-22: nyon mongs pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /
T02D2485:182b-25: log par spyod pa'i sbyor ba byas pa dang /
T02D2485:182b-26: nges pa bskyed pa ste brgyad kyis dngos gzhi'o //
T02D2485:182b-27: ston pa'i phyogs la tha ma'i don go bar gyur pa gzhug go //
T02D2485:182b-28: ldang ba ni tshogs pa'i mthu man chad bzhis dngos gzhi las ldang ngo //
T02D2485:182b-31: yul de gong ma lta bu yin pa dang /
T02D2485:182b-34: go ba'am nyon mongs pa khyad par can bskyed pa dang /
T02D2485:182b-35: dgongs pa ma yin pa ste dgus dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T02D2485:182b-36: de ni tshogs kyi 'khor los ldang ngo //
T02D2485:182b-37: gzhan ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2485:182b-38: chom rkun gyi gnas kyi grogs stobs can lta bur
T02D2485:182b-39: rdo rje spun kun la blta'o zhes pa ni bslab
T02D2485:182b-40: par bya ba'o // byams pa chen po spong ba dang //
T02D2485:182b-41: zhes pa la sems can shin tu sdug bsngal dang
T02D2485:182b-42: ldan pa la btang snyoms dang ldan pa dang der
T02D2485:183a-0: bgrod du rung ba na yod @183a * //
T02D2485:183a-1: par mthong ba'am thos pa dang /
T02D2485:183a-4: bdag la mthu yod pa dang /
T02D2485:183a-5: dgongs pa ma yin pa dang /
T02D2485:183a-6: bde ba'i sbyor ba 'dor ba ste bcus dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T02D2485:183a-7: tshogs pa'i mthu man chad bzhis de las ldang ngo //
T02D2485:183a-8: sems can thams cad la pham la sogs pa dang /
T02D2485:183a-9: bdag nyid kyi bar du 'du shes bskyed par bya'o zhes pa ni bslab par bya ba'o //
T02D2485:183a-10: byang chub sems ni 'dor ba dang //
T02D2485:183a-11: zhes pa ni dngos por 'dzin pa dang zhen pa ste /
T02D2485:183a-12: spong ba'i gdams ngag mi tshol ba dang /
T02D2485:183a-13: gnyen po mi bsten pa dang /
T02D2485:183a-14: yang dang yang du 'dor ba dang /
T02D2485:183a-15: de'i dbang gis nyes pa la sbyor ba'o //
T02D2485:183a-16: yan lag gi grangs ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2485:183a-17: bde ba'i sbyor ba 'dor ba zhes pa ni sdug
T02D2485:183a-18: bsngal dang bral ba'i sbyor ba 'dor ba zhes gzhag
T02D2485:183a-19: go // ldang ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2485:183a-20: ma rgal ba bsgral bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bslab par bya ba'o //
T02D2485:183a-21: lha yi bdag nyid phung po smod //
T02D2485:183a-25: de las gzhan du bsgom pa'o //
T02D2485:183a-26: yan lag ni thun mong ba bzhi dang /
T02D2485:183a-27: yul de dang de lta bu yin pa dang /
T02D2485:183a-29: gong ma gsum gang yang rung ba ste bdun gyi dngos gzhi'o //
T02D2485:183a-30: ldang ba ni bsnyen sgrub kyis so //
T02D2485:183a-31: lus la mtshan dang dpe byad la sogs pa bsam
T02D2485:183a-32: par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bslab par bya bya'o
T02D2485:183a-33: // theg pa gsum la smod pa dang //
T02D2485:183a-34: zhes bya ba ni bya ba dang gnyi ga dang /
T02D2485:183a-36: gsang ba'i theg pa gsum po rnal 'byor ma dang thabs dang zung du 'jug pa'o //
T02D2485:183a-37: smod pa ni gzhung bzhin ma smos pa'o //
T02D2485:183a-41: mi mthun pa'i sbyor ba byas pa dang /
T02D2485:183a-42: yang dag pa'i sbyor ba log pa ste brgyad kyis dngos gzhi'o //
T02D2485:183a-43: tshogs pa'i mthu man chad bzhis ldang ngo //
T02D2485:183a-44: med na mi 'byung ba'i lam gsum du shes par bya'o zhes pa ni bslab par bya ba'o //
T02D2485:183a-45: yang dag chos la yid gnyis za //
T02D2485:183a-46: zhes pa la srung ba dang /
T02D2485:183b-0: thob pa don dam pa'i rang bzhin @183b la yid gnyis za ba ste thun mong ba bzhi dang /
T02D2485:183b-1: don dam pa dag pa dang 'brel pa dang /
T02D2485:183b-3: med dam snyam pa'i blo gnyis dang /
T02D2485:183b-4: 'di la ma dad pa rang btang snyoms su dor ba ste dgus dngos gzhi'o //
T02D2485:183b-5: ldang ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2485:183b-6: chos thams cad la tshul gcig kho nas shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bslab par bya ba'o //
T02D2485:183b-7: chos la gnyis su 'byed pa zhes bya ba ni
T02D2485:183b-8: chos rnal 'byor chen po la sogs pa'i grub pa'i
T02D2485:183b-9: mtha' las grags pa'i bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i cha
T02D2485:183b-10: shin tu phra ba phyi rol pa'i grub pa'i mthar
T02D2485:183b-12: sangs rgyas pa'i grub pa'i mtha' la bzang ngan 'byed pa'am ston pa ste thun mong ba bzhi dang /
T02D2485:183b-15: mi mthun pa'i sbyor ba byas pa dang /
T02D2485:183b-17: dgongs pa ma yin pa ste dgus dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T02D2485:183b-18: tshogs pa'i mthu man chad bzhis ldang ngo //
T02D2485:183b-19: lam la bye brag med par bslab par bya zhing
T02D2485:183b-20: bden par smra bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni bslab
T02D2485:183b-21: par bya ba'o // gdug la byams dang chags bral dang //
T02D2485:183b-23: 'dir sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 'jig par byed pa dang /
T02D2485:183b-25: stobs dang ldan pas bcom pa'o //
T02D2485:183b-26: de dag chos dang zang zing gi 'brel ba dang bral bar bya ba ste /
T02D2485:183b-27: de las gzhan du byed pa ni nyes pa'o //
T02D2485:183b-29: yul khyad par can dang de ltar 'du shes pa dang /
T02D2485:183b-31: dgongs pa ma yin pa dang //
T02D2485:183b-32: gzhan gyis go ba ste dgus dngos gzhi'o //
T02D2485:183b-33: ldang ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2485:183b-34: rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang //
T02D2485:183b-35: dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed pa //
T02D2485:183b-36: 'bad pas gsad par bya ba yin no zhes bslab par bya ba'o //
T02D2485:183b-37: chags bral ba ni snying rje dang bral ba'o /
T02D2485:183b-38: skal min gsang ba ston pa dang //
T02D2485:183b-39: zhes 'byung ba la thun mong ba bzhi dang /
T02D2485:183b-40: rung bar ma byas pa'i yul dang /
T02D2485:183b-42: ngag gi sbyor ba byas pa dang /
T02D2485:183b-43: dbang dang 'brel zhing zab pa dang /
T02D2485:183b-44: rgya che ba brjod pa dang /
T02D2485:183b-45: dgongs pa ma yin pa dang /
T02D2485:183b-46: go ba ste bcus dngos gzhi'o //
T02D2485:183b-47: ldang ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2485:184a-1: gsang ba'i snod dkon par blta'o zhes pa ni bslab par bya ba'o //
T02D2485:184a-2: dad ldan sems ni sun 'byin dang //
T02D2485:184a-3: zhes 'byung ba la thun mong ba bzhi dang /
T02D2485:184a-4: yul rung bar gyur pa dang /
T02D2485:184a-6: dgongs pa ma yin pa dang /
T02D2485:184a-7: ngag gi sbyor ba byas pa dang /
T02D2485:184a-8: go ba ste dgus dngos gzhi'o //
T02D2485:184a-9: ldang ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2485:184a-10: chos kyi sbyin pas sems can thams cad tshim par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bslab par bya ba'o //
T02D2485:184a-11: dam tshig las ni ji bzhin rnyed mi bsten //
T02D2485:184a-12: zhes bya ba ni thun mong ba bzhi dang /
T02D2485:184a-16: dgongs pa ma yin pa dang /
T02D2485:184a-17: gzhan gyis go ba ste dgus dngos gzhi'o //
T02D2485:184a-18: ldang ba ni tshogs kyi 'khor los so //
T02D2485:184a-19: spyod pa thams cad dang mthun par bya'o zhes pa ni bslab par bya ba'o //
T02D2485:184a-20: shes rab rang bzhin can smod pa //
T02D2485:184a-21: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig dus su rung ba
T02D2485:184a-22: gzungs su byas pa'i ma yon tan dang ldan pa'o
T02D2485:184a-23: // smod pa ni skyon brjod pa'o //
T02D2485:184a-28: gang yang rung bas go bar byas pa dang /
T02D2485:184a-29: dgongs pa ma yin pa ste dgus dngos gzhi'o //
T02D2485:184a-30: ldang ba ni bsnyen sgrub la sogs pas so //
T02D2485:184a-31: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs par bya'o zhes pa ni bslab par bya ba'o //
T02D2485:184a-32: de dag kyang bsdu na gsum du 'du ste /
T02D2485:184a-33: byang chub sems 'dor ba de gshegs bka' 'das dang //
T02D2485:184a-34: byams spong theg gsum smod dang chos yid gnyis //
T02D2485:184a-36: slob dpon brnyas dang lha nyid phung po smod //
T02D2485:184a-37: dam tshig mi bsten shes rab smod pa rnams //
T02D2485:184a-39: mi bsngags brjod dang dang ldan sems sun 'byin //
T02D2485:184a-40: gdug la chags bral chos gnyis gsang ba ston //
T02D2485:184a-42: gzhan yang rtsa ba'i dngos gzhi'i yan lag ma tshang
T02D2485:184a-43: ba las sbom po la sogs pa gsum gyi bye
T02D2485:184a-44: brag gis rnam pa du mar 'gyur ba bstan pa
T02D2485:184a-45: las / 'dir de dang mi 'dra ba'i nyes pa sbom por bstan par bya ste /
T02D2485:184a-46: dam tshig dang ni mi ldan pa'i //
T02D2485:184a-47: rig ma bsten par dga' ba dang//
T02D2485:184b-0: @184b zhes 'byung ba la thun mong ba bzhi dang /
T02D2485:184b-1: yul dam tshig med pa dang /
T02D2485:184b-4: nyams su myong ba ste brgyad kyis dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T02D2485:184b-5: ldang ba ni bsnyen sgrub man chad kyis so //
T02D2485:184b-6: ma'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o zhes pa ni bslab par bya ba'o //
T02D2485:184b-7: tshogs kyi 'khor lor rtsod pa dang //
T02D2485:184b-8: zhes pa ni thun mong ba bzhi dang /
T02D2485:184b-9: bla ma'am rdo rje spun gyi tshogs pa dang /
T02D2485:184b-11: dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs pa'i dus dang /
T02D2485:184b-13: ngag gi sbyor ba byas pa dang /
T02D2485:184b-14: dgongs pa ma yin pa ste bcus dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T02D2485:184b-15: ldang ba ni tshogs kyis so //
T02D2485:184b-16: bag yod par bya zhes pa ni bslab par bya ba'o //
T02D2485:184b-17: sems can dad dang ldan pa la //
T02D2485:184b-18: dam chos gzhan du ston pa dang //
T02D2485:184b-19: zhes bya ba la thun mong ba bzhi dang /
T02D2485:184b-20: sems can snod du gyur pa dang /
T02D2485:184b-21: der 'du shes pa dang gzhan ston pa'i ngag gis sbyor ba byas pa dang /
T02D2485:184b-23: dgongs pa ma yin pa ste dgus dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T02D2485:184b-24: ldang ba ni bzlas pa la sogs pas so /
T02D2485:184b-25: bden par smra bar bya'o zhes pa ni bslab par bya ba'o //
T02D2485:184b-26: nyan thos dag tu rlom byed pa'i //
T02D2485:184b-27: nang du zhag bdun gnas pa dang //
T02D2485:184b-28: zhes pa la 'dir skur pa 'debs pa dang /
T02D2485:184b-29: mi mos pa yin par gzung ngo //
T02D2485:184b-30: zhag bdun nam drug tu 'gro na bar du gnas
T02D2485:184b-31: shing rang gi spyad pa mi byed pa na lung
T02D2485:184b-32: dang yul chos nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2485:184b-33: de las 'das pa ni dus kyi sgrub par tshang ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2485:184b-34: kha cig ni yon tan bdun dang ldan pa'i lha'i
T02D2485:184b-35: rnal 'byor can zhag gcig kyang gnas par mi bya'o
T02D2485:184b-36: zhes 'chad do // de yang 'di lta ste /
T02D2485:184b-37: dkyil 'khor tshogs dang sbyin sreg dang //
T02D2485:184b-38: mchod dang gtor ma gi rims dang //
T02D2485:184b-39: de nyid dang ni bdun du bstan //
T02D2485:184b-41: 'dir yang thun mong ba bzhi dang /
T02D2485:184b-45: dgongs pa ma yin pa ste /
T02D2485:184b-47: ldang ba ni tshogs kyi 'khor los so //
T02D2485:184b-48: gcig pur gnas par bya'o zhes pa ni bslab par bya ba'o//
T02D2485:185a-0: @185a * // spyor pa nges par ma byas pa'i //
T02D2485:185a-1: skal min gsang ba sgrogs pa dang //
T02D2485:185a-2: zhes pa ni dam tshig thob kyang phun sum tshogs pa ma yin pa dang /
T02D2485:185a-3: de dang mi ldan pa la bya'o //
T02D2485:185a-7: dbang dang 'brel ba'i gsang ba dang /
T02D2485:185a-8: ngag gi sbyor ba byas pa dang /
T02D2485:185a-10: dgongs pa ma yin pa ste bcus 'gyur ro //
T02D2485:185a-11: ldang ba ni bzlas pa la sogs pas so //
T02D2485:185a-12: brgyad brtag par bya'o zhes pa ni bslab par bya ba'o //
T02D2485:185a-13: gang zhig phyag rgya mi mkhas pas //
T02D2485:185a-14: lus kyi phyag rgya ston pa dang //
T02D2485:185a-15: zhes pa la thun mong ba bzhi dang /
T02D2485:185a-18: dgongs pa ma yin pa dang mthong ba ste brgyad kyis dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T02D2485:185a-19: ldang ba ni bsnyen sgrub kyis so //
T02D2485:185a-20: shin tu sba bar bya'o zhes pa ni bslab par bya ba'o //
T02D2485:185a-21: bsnyen sogs dag par ma byas par //
T02D2485:185a-23: zhes pa la thun mong ba bzhi dang /
T02D2485:185a-24: dag par ma byas pa dang /
T02D2485:185a-26: dgongs pa ma yin pa dang /
T02D2485:185a-27: sbyor ba dang zhugs pa ste dgus dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T02D2485:185a-28: ldang ba ni bsnyen sgrub kyis so ;
T02D2485:185a-29: / mtshan ma thob nas 'jug par bya'o zhes pa ni bslab par bya ba'o //
T02D2485:185a-30: sdom pa gnyis kyi bcas pa las //
T02D2485:185a-31: dgos pa med par 'da' ba dang //
T02D2485:185a-32: zhes pa la thun mong ba bzhi dang /
T02D2485:185a-33: ltung ba'i yul yin pa dang /
T02D2485:185a-35: dgongs pa ma yin pa dang /
T02D2485:185a-37: de dag las 'das pa ste dgus dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T02D2485:185a-38: ldang ba ni bzlas pa la sogs pas so //
T02D2485:185a-39: sdom pa gsum la gnas par bya'o //
T02D2485:185a-40: bla ma lnga bcu pa'i nyes pa ni ci rigs
T02D2485:185a-41: par bcu bzhi pa'i nang du 'dus par rig par
T02D2485:185a-42: bya'o // slob dpon chen po dpal la ksha m'i
T02D2485:185a-43: ka ra'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rtsa ba'i ltung
